list.appliesTo: Other Worker Farmer Housewife Fighter Shopkeeper
list.quip: I'm sorry, but I don't have time to talk.
I'm gonna rip your head off!
Do you wanna play a game?
I can run fast. Wanna see?
My cat's breath smells like cat food.
Daddy says you're a bad person.
My mom said you'll eat me if I'm bad.
I'm gonna be great, just like my dad!
I sure wish this wound would heal.
Seems like nobody appreciates my work.
Man, I hope this drought ends soon.
I sure hope it rains soon.
Life here is slow -- just the way I like it.
God sees all things. Repent, lest you rot for eternity in Gehennom.
Our religion is the ONLY true way to eternal life.
Hey, can you spare a copper?
I sleep in a box when the rains come.
Hrmph. Cook, clean, fetch... that's all I seem to do these days!
How about a roll in the hay?
You're the biggest hottie in the world.
Ooops. I dropped something in your pants. Let me get it.
Oh {NAME}... how do you keep so fit?
Can I have your autograph? On my chest?
I would never fake it for YOU.
Need someone to take care of that for you?
That a knife in your pocket?
Want to help a virgin lose her virginity?
Wanna pretend we're marhoos in mating season?
Only takes a few gold to get my attention.
Take a lonely lady on the town?
Still got that bruise from the headboard...
Been worn out ever since that last convention...
I'm a virgin. I'm just not very good at it.
Show a lady a good time, {NAME}?
You got the money, {NAME}, I've got the time.
I'm a virgin, but I need the money.
Be gentle, it's my first time. Today.
I'm not cheap, but I am on special.
I'm not free, but I'm available.
Want to help me lose your virginity?
Lost? I can take you where you wanna go.
No, I'm NOT going to wear the Mickey Mouse ears.
Honey, you just couldn't afford me.
I think you and I could become best of friends. Buy something!
How about buying something from your favorite merchant, me?
You look like you could use some of my supplies.
All my products come with a limited, lifetime guarantee!
{NAME}! I've got just the thing you need! Take a look at my stock.
